original: Larsson, Laurentius, läroverksadjunkt, Vadstena, f. 10/8/04 i Torsàs, Kalmar 1., av 0’scar L. o. Karolina Eliasson. G. 36 m. Ellen Sturzenbec-ker. Barn: Anne-Marie f. 38, Olof 40, Bengt 43. — Stud:ex. v. Lunds priv. elem:sk. 24, fil. mag. 31, provår v. Gbgs h. latin 37-38. Res. t. Tyskl. o. Danm. 35 o. 39, Norge 36. E. lär. i Sundsvall 31-36, vik. adj. där 36-37, timlär. v. Sundsvalls hand:sk. 37, e. o. adj. i Sundsvall 38-39, timlär. v. Sundsvalls hand:sk. 38-39, adj. i modersm. o. tyska v. Vadstena samrealsk. sed. 39.
translated:
Larsson, Laurentius, school teacher, Vadstena, b. 10/8/04 in Torsàs, Kalmar County, son of Oscar L. and Karolina Eliasson. Married in 1936 to Ellen Sturzenbecker. Children: Anne-Marie b. 1938, Olof b. 1940, Bengt b. 1943. 

Education: Graduated from Lund's private elementary school in 1924, obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1931, attended a preparatory course at Gothenburg's High Latin School in 1937-1938. Traveled to Germany and Denmark in 1935 and 1939 respectively, and to Norway in 1936. 

Career: Teacher in Sundsvall from 1931 to 1936, substitute teacher in Sundsvall in 1936-1937, part-time teacher at Sundsvall's Commercial School in 1937, temporary assistant teacher in Sundsvall in 1938-1939, part-time teacher at Sundsvall's Commercial School in 1938-1939. Currently working as an assistant teacher in Swedish and German at Vadstena Secondary School since 1939.
